about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Humming Bird Education is a Delhi based company involved in the business related to education. The company organizes Olympiad, a competitive examination where students are evaluated and their academic performance is ranked relative to their peer group.

Humming Bird Education uses factual, conceptual, reasoning, logical, analytical and problem-solving skills to help students better understand their strengths and weaknesses. The company provides study material, free mobile app, performance analysis report for all participants.

The Olympiad results also give an opportunity for schools to analyze the performance of their teachers with the help of deep insight provided.

Humming Bird Education is an asset-light and centrally managed company.

Products Offered
1. Humming Bird Talent Search Examination (HBTSE) - A Mathematics & Science Olympiad for Class 1 to 12
2. Humming Bird Commerce Competency Olympiad (HCC) - A commerce Olympiad that includes Accounts, Business Studies, and Economics for Classes 11 & 12.
3. Humming Bird Cyber Olympiad (HCO) - A Computer Olympiad for Class 1 to 12.
4. Humming Bird English Olympiad (HEO) - An English Olympiad for Class 1 to 12.
5. Humming Bird G.K. Olympiad (HGO) - A General Knowledge Olympiad for Class 1 to 12.
6. Humming Bird Hindi Olympiad (HHO) - A Hindi Olympiad for Class 1 to 12.
7. Humming Bird Math + Computer + English + Combined Olympiad (MCSE) - Olympiad that includes Mathematics, Computer, Science & English for Class 1 to 12.
8. Humming Bird MULTIPLE INTELLIGENCE TEST (HMIT) - MULTIPLE INTELLIGENCE TEST for Class 1 to 12. This Test includes questions on Mathematics, G.K., Science, English and Multiple Intelligence.
9. Humming Bird Mathematics Olympiad (HMO) - A Mathematics Olympiad for Class 1 to 12. The HMO is also available in ENGLISH MEDIUM, TAMIL MEDIUM and HINDI MEDIUM.
10. Humming Bird Science Olympiad (HSO) - A Science Olympiad for Class 1 to 12. The HSO is also available in ENGLISH MEDIUM, TAMIL MEDIUM and HINDI MEDIUM.
11. Problem Solving Olympiad (PSO) - A Problem Solving Olympiad for Class 3 to 12.
12. SPELL BEE - A Spelling Competition for Class 1 to 12.

For the Fiscal years ended on March 31, 2018, March 31, 2017, and March 31, 2016, the company's gross revenue stood at Rs. 117.09 Lakhs, Rs. 93.70 Lakhs and Rs. 51.56 Lakhs respectively. Further, its PAT for the Fiscal years ended on March 31, 2018, March 31, 2017, and March 31, 2016, stood at Rs. 10.57 Lakhs, Rs. 4.46 Lakhs and Rs. 0.78 Lakhs respectively.

faqs.question: What is the Humming Bird Education ipo?
faqs.answer:
Humming Bird Education ipo is a SME IPO of 163000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.15 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹132 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1000.

The IPO opens on March 15, 2019, and closes on March 19, 2019.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Humming Bird Education ipo through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Humming Bird Education ipo using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Humming Bird Education ipo by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Humming Bird Education ipo through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Humming Bird Education ipo' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Humming Bird Education ipo will open?
faqs.answer: The Humming Bird Education ipo opens on March 15, 2019 and closes on March 19, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Humming Bird Education ipo?
faqs.answer: Humming Bird Education ipo lot size is 1000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,32,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Humming Bird Education ipo?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Humming Bird Education ipo online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Humming Bird Education ipo allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Humming Bird Education ipo will be done on Monday, March 25, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, March 27, 2019. Check the Humming Bird Education ipo allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Humming Bird Education ipo listing date?
faqs.answer: The Humming Bird Education ipo listing date is on Thursday, March 28, 2019.
